about_the_game:
Automatically upgrades all your storages to 10th level in Elemental Heroes game.
Could be especially valuable if you have to go on vocation for couple of days and don't want to loose resources, from your mines, because of the low storages capacity.

Please restart the game to claim your purchase.

WARNING! If you have several characters, this DLC will be delivered to the first character who will enter the game.
detailed_description:
Automatically upgrades all your storages to 10th level in Elemental Heroes game.
Could be especially valuable if you have to go on vocation for couple of days and don't want to loose resources, from your mines, because of the low storages capacity.

Please restart the game to claim your purchase.

WARNING! If you have several characters, this DLC will be delivered to the first character who will enter the game.

short_description: Automatically upgrades all your storages to 10th level in Elemental Heroes game. Could be especially valuable if you have to go on vocation for couple of days out and don't want to loose resources, that will be collected during this time, but have low level storages.
